title: Green herb frittatas with chunky tomato salsa
description: Individual frittatas, made with fresh parsley and chives, served with ripe tomato salsa, packed with basil.
ingredients: 2 tbsp each of parsley and chives
flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
5 ripe plum tomatoes, seeded and roughly chopped
1 small red onion, very finely chopped
flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
